verbose_text: It was confirmed that sitagliptin decreased that HbA1c level irrespective of the concomitant medications used, being effective for HbA1c, fasting plasma glucose, and postprandial glucose until 24 weeks of treatment.
evidence: sitagliptin decreased that HbA1c level irrespective of the concomitant medications used, being effective for HbA1c, fasting plasma glucose, and postprandial glucose
